EmailTemplate.description: Updated HTML version of the invoice template
EmailTemplate.name: FSP Invoice HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Five Star Professional Invoice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.kugo2p__ContactBilling__c},
Great news! We have processed your order on {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Release_Date__c}.
You are all set to use your marketing tools in pursuit of your business objectives.
To view your invoice or to download a PDF copy for your records, please find the attached document {!kugo2p__SalesOrder__c.Name}.
We appreciate your business and are fired up about our partnership!
Kind regards,
Five Star Professional 888-438-5782 Option 2 | Email: billing@fivestarprofessional.com 2117 Cliff Drive Eagan, MN 55122
